quoteText: In some circumstances your information may be shared with us by third parties, but only where you have specifically consented. Examples include registering for a human rights education course with our external provider, or if you register your interest in joining Amnesty International or one of its campaigns through Facebook, Facebook will share information such as your name and email address with us.
title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent

tosdr.case: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
